title: Breakout Picks + Austin Ekeler Joins the Show! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/24
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason deliver Breakout picks for the 2021 season! Which players will take the leap for fantasy football? Plus, a fun chat with Austin Ekeler and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 24th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (5:30) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (6:10) - Giovani Bernard
 (10:45) - Jameis Winston/Taysom Hill
 (17:25) - NFL News & Notes
 (27:45) - Breakouts
 (28:15) - Diontae Johnson
 (35:25) - T.J. Hockenson
 (42:15) - Michael Pittman Jr.
 (47:05) - Bonus Breakout Picks
 (50:20) - Austin Ekeler Interview
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
